name: hammock-request
description: Make requests use the hammock HTTP mocks

scripts.test: npm run jshint -s && npm run cover -s
scripts.cover: istanbul cover --report html --print detail -- test/index.js && npm run check-cover -s
scripts.travis: npm run cover -s && istanbul report lcov && ((cat coverage/lcov.info | coveralls) || exit 0)

readme:
# hammock-request

<!--
    [![build status][build-png]][build]
    [![Coverage Status][cover-png]][cover]
    [![Davis Dependency status][dep-png]][dep]
-->

<!-- [![NPM][npm-png]][npm] -->

Make requests use the hammock HTTP mocks

## Example

```js
var hammockRequest = require('hammock-request');

var myHandler = function (req, resp) {
    resp.end(JSON.stringify('hello world'));
}

hammockRequest(myHandler, {
    url: '/foo',
    json: { 'foo': 'bar' }
})
```

## Docs

// TODO. State what the module does.

## Installation

`npm install hammock-request`

## Tests

`npm test`
